google_reviews.author: MackA Ken
google_reviews.review: This place is set in the northern end of bellingham with close access to numerous shopping outlets and Bellis Fair mall.  The surround area is lush Woodlands that during the right time of year you can expect to see wild deer grazing upon the grass.  All in all the apartments are nice and it is a fairly quiet complex.

google_reviews.author: Barbara Barb Casort
google_reviews.review: Visiting a friend I noticed well kept buildings and landscaping but tenents who regularly tossed trash toward dumpsters.  Weekends cars don't obey parking regulations and cigarette butts are not picked up in the smoking areas

summary.text:
Good

Meadow Wood Townhomes stands out positively for its location and surrounding aesthetics. A number of user reviews praise its picturesque setting amidst lush woodlands, providing a serene environment enriched with the occasional sight of deer, ideal for nature lovers. Additionally, the complex's proximity to shopping outlets and schools contributes to its convenience, with several tenants appreciating how easily accessible amenities are.

Great

Several residents have shared their delight with the welcoming neighborhood at Meadow Wood Townhomes. The community offers a sense of comfort with schools available within a short distance, making it an enticing option for families. User reviews often highlight exceptional management, with some tenants expressing that issues are promptly addressed and concerns heard, particularly noting an exemplary landlord by name, indicating a personal and attentive management style.

Bad

However, not all aspects of Meadow Wood Townhomes receive praise. Some user reviews point out issues with the complex's maintenance, commenting on recurring problems like untended trash near dumpsters and neglected parking regulations over weekends. Concerns about cigarette butts in smoking areas illustrate that while the buildings and landscaping may appear well-kept at first glance, some common areas do suffer from neglect.

Ugly

On a more critical note, some tenants have experienced significant issues at Meadow Wood Townhomes, as highlighted in certain user reviews. Health and safety concerns have been raised regarding mold and other serious maintenance issues, with criticism towards management for their lack of response to these problems. There are also alarming mentions of increasing crime and drug activities within the area, which have left some residents feeling unsafe and unsupported by management.
